snippet.title: Mikey Boots - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
iOS: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mikey-boots/id842231156?ls=1&mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.noodlecake.mikeyboots

Mikey Boots is a challenging platformer for iOS with simple touch controls! 

Run and fly through dangerous levels! 
Watch out for enemies and spikes! 
Collect coins and find hidden Golden Shorts!

• 6 unique environments with 42 levels 
• 2 playable characters 
• 230 fun disguises 
• Earn achievements 
• Compete on Game Center 
• MFi Controller Support 

Universal App and iCloud support

Follow us on Twitter: @beavertapgames
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/beavertapgames
